Title: Hard Goodbyes: My Father
Writer: Jan Fleischer (screenplay), Nikos Panayotopoulos, Penny Panayotopoulou, Katerina Shina (scenario supervisor), Laya Yourgou (dramatisation)
Actors: Yorgos Karayannis, Stelios Mainas, Ioanna Tsirigouli, Christos Stergioglou
Plot: In 1969 Athens, a 10 year old boy struggles to come to terms with the sudden death of his father.
